win.template: With this victory {{{ winner }}} makes stronger claim on top position.
With yet another victory {{{ winner }}} continues their strong performance.
{{{ winner }}} continue in first position after this victory.

draw.template: {{{ name }}} might be number one, but still they need to keep their guard up.
{{{ opponent }}} put up a good fight and {{{ name }}} might be number one, but still they need to keep their guard up.

loss.template: This match showed everyone that {{{ loser }}} is not unbeatable even when they are leading the rankings..
{{{ winner }}} wasn't afraid of the {{{ loser }}} and results show that it doesn't matter if you are top team, you still have to give 100% for every match.
Did {{{ loser }}} start to think they are invincible and did they become lazy? This is Blood Bowl and you have to play your best in every match.

ok.template: With this win {{{ winner }}} improved their chances nicely and certainly will stay at the top.
This victory was very important for {{{ winner }}} as they are battling for top position.

bad.template: With this win {{{ winner }}} keeps itself still relevant in fighting for top position. First position looks distant but otherwise season is going well for them.
This victory was very important for {{{ winner }}} as they still have some chances of winning the competition.

theoretical.template: With this win {{{ winner }}} keeps itself still somewhat relevant in fighting for top position.
This victory was very important for {{{ winner }}} as they still have slight chances of winning the competition.
In theory {{{ winner }}} still has some chance of winning the competition, but it doesn't look too good even after this win.

bad.template: After this loss {{{ loser }}} doesn't really have much of a chance to win the competition.

win.template: {{{ winner }}} might be near the bottom but they still should have good chances. And certainly ths win was very important for them.
This victory was very important for {{{ winner }}} as it should move them up in rankings.
This victory was very important for {{{ winner }}} as it should move them up from bottom.
Are {{{ winner }}} bouncing up with this victory? Certainly that seems like only way to go for them. When you hit the bottom you either bounce back or say 'splat!'
{{{ winner }}} doesn't have much of a chance to win the competition, but still win is a win.

loss.template: {{{ loser }}} continues their trademark for this season. I think someone should tell them you should aim high in rankings and not for the bottom.
With this loss {{{ loser }}} is stuck in bottom of rankings. I am sure fans would like to get their hands on the coach...
I am starting to think {{{ loser }}} should just quit. Well of course actual good teams have to get their wins from someone.
